resources.string: The changes will take effect after the restart
Aceito os termos do acordo sobre o tratamento de dados pessoais

Olá!

O meu nome é AstroPanda e eu vou ajudá-lo a olhar para o futuro! Reúno ciências exactas, melhores práticas e tecnologia moderna para conhecer a si próprio, o seu futuro, o futuro da sua família e do seu ambiente.


Por favor passe este pequeno questionário e receberá um total de 1050 bónus Astromonet na nossa candidatura. Responda a todas as suas perguntas e obtenha o estatuto VIP na nossa candidatura!
Seleccione qual deles lhe interessa e o que pretende utilizar. \nEscolha não mais do que 2 opções
Consulta online com astrólogos/numerologistas profissionais sobre quaisquer questões
Em que previsões para 2020 está mais interessado? \nEscolha não mais do que 2 opções
Previsão de dias bons e dias maus
Note what you are interested in and what you would use \nEscolha não mais do que 2 opções
Esoteric (energy cleansing, evil eye and environment testing for vampirism)
Astro Dating (search for a partner based on your life maps, destinations and true needs)
How often do you have questions that you would like answers from professional astrologers/numerologists?
What kind of reward are you willing to give to an astrologer/numerologist for answering 1 question that concerns you?

Are you interested in becoming part of an astrological/esoteric community that includes: master classes from different speakers, new topics to explore, discussion platforms, chat rooms with like-minded people, etc.?
Which questions would you like to answer and which ones? What do you most care about?
What kind of reward are you willing to give to an astrologer/numerologist for consulting with famous personalities and stars?
I don\'t care if an astrologer works with famous personalities or not. I\'m not willing to overpay for it.
What does the application have to be in order for you to use it every day?

Congratulations!

 You have successfully answered all the questions!
 Now you have received VIP status and 500 astrobonuses, which you can spend on additional services! 

The application is currently under development. МWe will notify you when the application is launched and you can use the benefits! Thank you from AstroPanda!
